akn:section.akn:heading: Employment of prisoners; terms and conditions; opportunities for advancement; qualifications.

akn:content.akn:p: A prison industry shall employ eligible prisoners in all entry-level positions to the extent feasible.

Prisoners employed in a prison industry shall not work more than 40 hours per week, except that prisoners may volunteer to work overtime hours for overtime payment at 1 1/2 times the normal hourly wage when necessary to meet a prison industry’s production needs.
